metadata.title: CVE-2023-50463 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The caddy-geo-ip (aka GeoIP) middleware through 0.6.0 for Caddy 2, whentrust_header X-Forwarded-For is used, allows attackers to spoof theirsource IP address via an X-Forwarded-For header, which may bypass aprotection mechanism (trusted_proxy directive in reverse_proxy or IPaddress range restrictions).

criterions.comment: geoip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
